Detailed Description

API for Atmel SPI module.

Frédéric Nadeau

SPI mode typedef.

Operation mode typedef for the SPI module.

typedef enum spi_prescaler_e spi_prescaler_t

Prescalers typedef for the SPI module.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum spi_mode_e

List of available SPI mode.

Enumerator:
spi_mode_0 

CPOL = 0, CPHA = 0

spi_mode_1 

CPOL = 0, CPHA = 1

spi_mode_2 

CPOL = 1, CPHA = 0

spi_mode_3 

CPOL = 1, CPHA = 1

enum spi_op_mode_e

List of available operation mode for the SPI module.

Enumerator:
spi_op_mode_single_master 

SPI act as a single master on bus. Chip Select pin will be configured as output to prevent fall back to slave mode.

spi_op_mode_multi_mMaster 

SPI is configured as master but can fall back as slave if Chip Select pin is driven low.

spi_op_mode_slave 
enum spi_prescaler_e

List of available prescalers for the SPI module.

Enumerator:
spi_prescaler_2 

OSCCLK/2

spi_prescaler_4 

OSCCLK/4

spi_prescaler_8 

OSCCLK/8

spi_prescaler_16 

OSCCLK/16

spi_prescaler_32 

OSCCLK/32

spi_prescaler_64 

OSCCLK/64

spi_prescaler_128 

OSCCLK/128

spi_op_mode_t  masterSlaveMode,
spi_mode_t  mode,
spi_prescaler_t  scaler 
)

Configure the SPI port.

Parameters:
isMsbtrue if MSB fist, false for LSB first.
masterSlaveModeuse spi_op_mode_t to select operation mode.
modeUse spi_mode_t to select
scalerUse spi_prescaler_t to select clock prescaler.

void spi_set_mode ( spi_mode_t  mode)

Configure SPI operation mode.

Parameters:
modeuse spi_mode_t, see Atmel documentation.
void spi_set_operation_mode ( spi_op_mode_t  mode)

Configure SPI in Slave or Master operation mode.

Parameters:
modeuse spi_op_mode_t to select master or slave mode.
void spi_set_prescaler ( spi_prescaler_t  scaler)

Configure SPI clock to be use in Master mode.

Parameters:
scalerDivision factor, use spi_prescaler_t to select clock source.
void spi_transfer ( uint8_t  ubDataOut,
uint8_t *  pubDataIn 
)

Send byte over SPI bus.

Parameters:
ubDataOutData to be send.
pubDataInPointer to 8 bit data space. Red value will be saved at specified address.
void spi_transferISR ( uint8_t  ubDataOut,
uint8_t *  pubDataIn 
)

Start a new byte transfer and get last byte in, use only in ISR function.

Parameters:
ubDataOutData to be send.
pubDataInPointer to 8 bit data space. Read value will be saved at specified address. If address is (void*) 0, received data will be discarded.
